title: 05/31/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 05/31/21 DPS Best Of
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Rob Parker, in for Dan Patrick, react to the Lakers losing to the Suns as Anthony Davis goes down with an injury. Doug pinpoints the exact moment where the Mavericks let the Clippers back into the series. Michael Lee of the Washington Post joins the guys to discuss Kyrie Irving's controversial return to Boston. Plus, should Naomi Osaka face disqualification for refusing to address the media at the French Open?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
